mapper.sql: company_id, company_name, contacts, phone, company_address, qr_code, create_id, create_name, create_time, client_number, parent_id
mapper.select:
select t.company_id, t.company_name, t.contacts, t.phone, t.company_address, t.qr_code, t.create_id, t.create_name, t.create_time, t.client_number, t.parent_id from promote_company t where 1=1
and t.company_id = #{form.companyId}
and t.company_name like concat('%',#{form.companyName},'%')
and t.parent_id is null
and t.parent_id is not null

select t.company_id, t.company_name, t.contacts, t.phone, t.company_address, t.qr_code, t.create_id, t.create_name, t.create_time, t.client_number, t.parent_id from promote_company t where t.parent_id = #{parentId}

select t.company_id, t.company_name, t.contacts, t.phone, t.company_address, t.qr_code, t.create_id, t.create_name, t.create_time, t.client_number, t.parent_id from promote_company t where t.company_id = #{companyId}

select t.company_id, t.company_name, t.contacts, t.phone, t.company_address, t.qr_code, t.create_id, t.create_name, t.create_time, t.client_number, t.parent_id from promote_company t where t.parent_id is null
